resources.string: The easiest way to watch TV on the Smartphone!
ATTENTION: the app is created for illustration purposes only and is not intended to violate privacy or law for watching TV and pay TV channels. Continuing accept the terms
Watch all the TV channels and Pay television comfortably on your smartphone
Few banner ads to enjoy the best possible app
Remember to install XMTV player to watch all channels
Go to official site and download it
To see the welcome slider again, goto Settings -> apps -> welcome slider -> clear data
